title: Salem
description: Killer for hire.Angel of death.President of Fallen Ravens MC.My life is rooted in evil and sin. My hands are washed in the blood of corrupted souls, including my own.In the end, they all beg for mercy. They all ask for forgiveness. But absolution is not mine to give.All I want is their pain.I accepted long ago my soul belonged to the devil. Redemption for a man like me doesn't exist.Sage should have walked away, but she refused. That was her first mistake. Her second mistake was giving herself to me. Now that I've had a taste, I'll be damned if I let her go.Sage is perfect.I'm broken.But she just might be my salvation.The annihilated MC responsible for the death of our former Presidentâ€”the man I called family is being resurrected and growing in numbers.Threats are made, and a bitter rivalry is reborn.She's mine, and they took her.Now I'm seeking vengeance.I won't stop until their blood stains the streets of Salem.
author: Crystal  Daniels
